Name: Too Ache Sidecar
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tuaca replaces Cointreau in this twist on the Sidecar.
History: Created in 2009 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England at the insistence of Charlotte Ashburner, UK Tuaca Brand Manager. See our Sidecar cocktail page for the full story behind the origins of the Sidecar, its history and variations .
Nutrition: One serving of Too Ache Sidecar contains 221 calories
